title: Style a component two ways
description: We are making components again! You can decide mostly, but I want two identical components. First component will be styled with a styling file (less). The other will be styled inline with the html style property.  Suggestion is to make a card box of some kind with a litle fun styling to show your work.
requirements: First component styled with a LESS file
Second component styled with inline styles
Component example: card box with creative styling
